metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8043 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The unimac_mdio_probe function in drivers/net/phy/mdio-bcm-unimac.c in the Linux kernel through 4.15.8 does not validate certain resource availability, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference). It was discovered that the Broadcom UniMAC MDIO bus controller driver in the Linux kernel did not properly validate device resources. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8043` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-13-generic - 4.15.0-13.14
